# MentionMeAI

> Get your brand mentioned by Perplexity, ChatGPT, and Gemini.

MentionMeAI is a specialized agency focused on **Generative Engine Optimization (GEO)** and **AI SEO**. We help brands optimize their content to be cited and recommended by Large Language Models (LLMs) and AI search engines.

## Core Services

*   **LLM Visibility Audit**: Analyzing brand presence across major AI models.
*   **Answer Engine Optimization (AEO)**: Optimizing content for direct answers.
*   **AI Content Structuring**: formatting content for machine readability.

## Navigation

*   [Home](https://mentionmeai.com/) - Main landing page.
*   [Blog](https://mentionmeai.com/blog) - Insights and strategies on AI SEO.
*   [Book a Call](https://mentionmeai.com/#book-meet) - Schedule a consultation.
